page.title: 14FARMING IN LAMERTON
page.content: Mr Eggins farms crops and beef.His farm is 180 acres.He has lived on the farm for 45 years.He has Fresian cross cows and Charolais cattle.He owns two tracters,rotor mower,bailer,muck- spreader and an artificial manure speader.He grows Barley and Grass.He has not got any spare time and has one employee.He has not had many changes in the farming business.The times that he works on the farm is 7.30-19.30.His dogs help him with rounding up sheep. NEIL SARGENT PETER LORENZI Mr Hill's farm has history back to 1700.He keeps 40 cows and 40 followers (followers are bulls and bullocks)He bought the farm 22 years ago.When he moved here there were 70 sheep.But he does not keep sheep any more.He keeps two tractors in working order.He keeps the cows for their milk and
